title: Mudslides
description: Mudslides are dangerous natural disasters that cause chaos and destruction in communities around the world. Mudslides provides students with a comprehensive look at these natural disasters, including what happens before, during, and after a mudslide. Detailed information and stunning photographs of mudslides will keep students engaged with the text. This book can be used to teach students how to determine cause-and-effect relationships as well as how to summarize to better understand a text.
